name: Demon's Revenge
flavorText: Sulam met an unfortunate end when he tried to harvest the flesh of a demon that was not actually dead. He was never able to complete this, the last piece of his set. Fortunately, he left the plans for its construction.
flavorTextHtml: Sulam met an unfortunate end when he tried to harvest the flesh of a demon that was not actually dead. He was never able to complete this, the last piece of his set. Fortunately, he left the plans for its construction.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 +999 Fire Thorns Damage(3) Set:     
 1.1% Chance to Fear on Hit(4) Set:     
 +3% Damage to Demons    
 Chance to reflect projectiles when you are hit by enemies.
